Interrupts.Name: Snatch Memory
Interrupts.Trigger: A foe in range 2 uses an ability and the ability resolves.
Interrupts.Effects: The foe must save or lose the memory of that ability, becoming unable to use it until after their entire following turn is over. If the ability is a stance or aura, it has no effect for the duration.

Actions.Name: Beat Down
Actions.Charge: Deals bonus damage for every status a foe is suffering from.

Actions.Name: Steal Speed
Actions.Effects: An adjacent foe is slowed. Slowed foes take [fray] damage.

Actions.Name: Pilfer Luck
Actions.Description: The hob marks a foe in range 3.
Actions.Mark: While marked the foe cannot gain boons. Instead, when the foe would gain a boon, the Hob gains +1 boon on all attacks and saves on its following turn. A foe can end this mark by choosing to roll all attacks and saves with +1 curse for their entire turn. The mark then ends at the end of that turn.

Actions.Name: Cavort
Actions.Description: The Hob ends its turn and gains
Actions.Delay: It's next turn must be slow. At the start of that turn, At the start of that turn, it targets a close blast 2 area, then teleports adjacent to a foe 3 times, dealing [D] to that foe each time. A different foe must be chosen each time unless all foes in the area have been hit at least once by this ability.

Actions.Name: Steal Sight
Actions.Description: An adjacent foe is blinded+. They can end this condition by ending a turn adjacent to an ally.
